title: São João da Bahia Theater
text:
São João da Bahia Theater was a 19th Century Brazilian Theater located at Castro Alves Square (formerly Sé district) in the <a href="Salvador%2C%20Bahia">Salvador</a>, <a href="Bahia">Bahia</a>. It was started to be built in 1806 and inaugurated in 1812. It was a very large Theater in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, with a seating capacity of around two thousand people.
There is a <a href="virtual%20museum">virtual museum</a>, the São João da Bahia Virtual Museum, that introduces this theater.
